body_html:
For API review:

Contrib is on the chopping block. If we want this behavior, we can't make it in v1.x because it is a backwards-incompatible change. Proposal: export this using: @tf_export(v1="where_v2", v2="where") and add an @deprecation to the current version of where.
body_text:
For API review:
Contrib is on the chopping block. If we want this behavior, we can't make it in v1.x because it is a backwards-incompatible change. Proposal: export this using: @tf_export(v1="where_v2", v2="where") and add an @deprecation to the current version of where.
body:
For API review:

Contrib is on the chopping block. If we want this behavior, we can't make it in v1.x because it is a backwards-incompatible change. Proposal: export this using: `@tf_export(v1="where_v2", v2="where")` and add an `@deprecation` to the current version of `where`.
